column4: Ubuntu is a piece of crap, I've been trying for hours to get these dance pads to work, which should just work as usb joysticks, but there are no joystick devices or anything in /dev or /dev/input
There are quite a few people who would disagree with you. :)
they can disagree all they want, but it won't make the usb joystick devices work.
This is true. The simple answer would be...if you don't like it, don't use it, don't complain
